column4: is there any way to get the proprietary nvidia geforce go 7300 drivers to work?
you will need t clean reinstall
is that the only way to get it to work with the geforcego7300?
if you install nvidia-current it will work
the driver doesnt work. it goes back to generic
can you expand on that. Simply saying "It doesn't work" helps nobody, most of all you
it wont function defaults back to the generic driver
keeping stuff on one line makes things clearer
use nvidia-xconfig to generate an xorg.conf file, it should make the driver load
if not then you can run:  less /var/log/Xorg.0.log    and read the x server log to see what's going on
is there a site that describes how to do it?
take a look at my forum post. one second...
